text: Dennis Nicolaas Maria Bergkamp (; born 10 May 1969) is a Dutch professional football coach and former player who was most recently the Assistant manager of Ajax. Bergkamp was named in FIFA 100, a list of the 125 greatest living footballers made by Brazilian retired footballer Pelé. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup† Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Ajax 1986–87 Eredivisie 14 2 5 0 4 0 23 2 1987–88 Eredivisie 25 5 1 0 6 1 32 6 1988–89 Eredivisie 30 13 3 3 1 0 34 16 1989–90 Eredivisie 25 8 2 1 1 0 28 9 1990–91 Eredivisie 33 25 3 1 – – 36 26 1991–92 Eredivisie 30 24 3 0 11 6 44 30 1992–93 Eredivisie 28 26 4 4 8 3 40 33 Total 185 103 21 9 31 10 237 122 Inter Milan 1993–94 Serie A 31 8 6 2 11 8 48 18 1994–95 Serie A 21 3 3 0 2 1 26 4 Total 52 11 9 2 13 9 74 22 Arsenal 1995–96 Premier League 33 11 8 5 – – 41 16 1996–97 Premier League 29 12 4 2 1 0 34 14 1997–98 Premier League 28 16 11 5 1 1 40 22 1998–99 Premier League 29 12 8 3 3 1 40 16 1999–2000 Premier League 28 6 0 0 11 4 39 10 2000–01 Premier League 25 3 5 1 5 1 35 5 2001–02 Premier League 33 9 6 2 7 3 46 14 2002–03 Premier League 29 4 7 1 5 2 41 7 2003–04 Premier League 28 4 4 1 6 0 38 5 2004–05 Premier League 29 8 5 0 4 0 38 8 2005–06 Premier League 24 2 3 0 4 1 31 3 Total 315 87 61 20 47 13 423 120 Career total 552 201 91 32 91 32 734 264 †Includes cup competitions: the KNVB Cup, Coppa Italia, Football League Cup and FA Cup.
